attributes.action: Make CCTV mandatory in all new homes and buildings
attributes.additional_details:
We are petitioning to have every new planning approval to include CCTV as a mandatory measure.

Not only would crime be deterred, but the Police would be able to use footage from such systems to bring around proper convictions.

The standardisation of CCTV would lead to huge savings in Police budgets long-term and reduce fear for home owners and businesses across the UK.
